page.title: 03STIRCHLEY GRANGE TODAY
page.content: {STIRCHLEY GRANGE}was opened as an {ENVIRONMENTAL and INTERPRETATION {CENTRE}in 1983. It is for the use of anyone who is interested in finding out about{TELFORD NEW TOWN.}It provides information about the new and the old. You can study the layout and running of a modern new town and also what has been done to reclaim and restore the dereliction of the past. Because of the{INDUSTRIAL REVOLUTION}a great deal of the land was despoiled with abandoned spoil heaps and pit shafts.People come from all over the world to see what has happened to the land, how it has been repaired and what use it has been put to.{STIRCHLEY {GRANGE}is also the base for several environmental organisations such as {the GREENWOOD TRUST,TELFORD CHILDRENS {WOODLAND PROJECT,the COUNTRYSIDE {WARDENS,the WATCH GROUP etc.
